mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_a_exit VALUES( tl_a_exit_seq.nextval, #{dorm_student_pk}, #{reason}, #{exit_date}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(tapc.POINT) FROM TL_A_POINT tap JOIN TL_A_POINT_CATEGORY tapc ON tap.POINT_CATEGORY_PK = tapc.POINT_CATEGORY_PK JOIN TL_A_DORM_STUDENT tads ON tap.DORM_STUDENT_PK = tads.DORM_STUDENT_PK WHERE tads.DORM_STUDENT_PK = ( SELECT DORM_STUDENT_PK FROM TL_A_DORM_STUDENT WHERE STUDENT_PK IN ( SELECT STUDENT_PK FROM TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO WHERE STUDENT_PK = #{STUDENT_PK} ) AND DORM_STUDENT_PK IN ( SELECT tads.DORM_STUDENT_PK FROM TL_A_SEMESTER tas JOIN TL_A_DORM_STUDENT tads ON tas.SEMESTER_PK = tads.SEMESTER_PK WHERE tas.PROGRESS_STATE = 'Y' ) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_a_diary VALUES( tl_a_diary_seq.nextval, #{executive_pk}, #{content}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT t2.dorm_notice_pk, t2.staff_pk, t2.title, t2.content, t2.created_at FROM (SELECT t1.*, Rownum rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM TL_A_DORM_NOTICE tadn) t1 ORDER BY DORM_NOTICE_PK desc) t2 WHERE t2.rnum < 4
